snippet.name: query
snippet.starttext: <cfmodule template="/#request.SEMap#/obj/query.cfm" class="$${class}" returnlist="$${returnlist:no|yes}" cache="$${cache:yes|no}" sortby="$${sortby:NAME}" subclasses="$${subclasses:yes|no}" returnuri="$${returnuri:no|yes}" resultstart="$${resultstart:1}" resultlimit="$${resultlimit:0}" resultcount="$${resultcount}" resultvar="$${resultvar}" > <!--- Search critera here --->
